file_content.text: I really want to hear what the Republic has to offer me, because last I checked, I wasn't winning any popularity contests with Command.
But that'll have to wait until my work here is done. I couldn't stand to leave without doing my part for the Balmorrans.
We can do this faster together. What's the objective?
Why don't I pitch in?
Hmm. Yeah. Yeah, that could work. Count yourself in, Captain.
Are you telling me you actually care about helping these people?
You've got to be joking.
Why else would I be here?
Your "work" has almost gotten a lot of good people killed. It ends now.
This isn't up for discussion.
What was that? I'm sorry, your signal seems to be cutting in and out.
You know, if you're really interested in getting me on your team, you might want to pitch in with this operation.
My odds of surviving go way up if I have Havoc Squad's help. I'd say that's better for all of us.
If it gets you into Havoc Squad sooner, I'll do it.
All right.
Great! We'll be on our way in no time.
It doesn't sound like I have any other options.
What choice do I have?
Yeah, let's make the best of a bad situation.
Not a chance.
What's that? You realize the only way you'll catch up with me is by helping out? That's rather bright, Captain.
My team and I just grabbed an enemy VIP named Brel Orus. He's a Balmorran fat-cat who sold out to the Imps.
Thieving mongrel slime! You'll pay for this! You'll pay for--argh!
Brel has "volunteered" the location of a hazard vault where my objective is hidden. I'm borrowing a Republic missile battery to blast it open.
What's hidden inside the hazard vault, Vik?
Your "objective"?
Let me worry about that part.
It sounds like you already have everything covered.
Where do I come in?
I won't stand by while you misuse more Republic equipment.
Stop this now.
What? The battery's being fired at the Imps, just like it was designed to do.
I need you to clear a path. There are all sorts of defenses that could stop my missile before it hits.
The Imps have anti-missile turrets, shields, defensive sensors... why don't you start with the sensors? Take them down, then contact me again, copy?
I'll be in touch, Vik.
Copy that.
Can't wait.
When I catch up to you, Vik, we're going to have a little chat.
You're going to pay for this.
Wow. I never would've thought I was your type.
Sounds fun.
I'll be seeing you, sir.
I call the shots around here!
Sorry, didn't catch that. We'd better just talk later. Good luck!
Hmm. You are not the man I left behind to cover us, but you are answering his holo. Just who does that make you, exactly?
I'm the commander of Havoc Squad. I'm here to recruit you.
Your new CO.
Haha! I thought that message was a prank. This is too good.
I'm interested in meeting up so I can help with your top secret mission.
Someone who wants to help.
Come on. I can see the Havoc badge even over the holo. You're here about that message I got.
I'm Havoc Squad's CO. Surrender immediately, or my team will hunt you down.
Shut up and listen.
Nice to meet you, too. I guess that message I got wasn't a prank after all.
